Thu, 04 Apr 2024 06:56:23 +0000 A hospitality group operating popular New Zealand-founded restaurants Botswana Butchery and White + Wong’s will close its Australian eateries. Photo / File

Thu, 04 Apr 2024 06:13:00 +0000 Megat Ashman Aqif Megat Irman Jefni, Phillip Wayne Woodham and Wan Adlina Alisa were killed in a horror crash at Lake Pukaki during Easter Weekend.

Lottery Facebook scam: Robert Sands sentenced for scams targeting Canterbury pensioner https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/robert-sands-sentenced-for-scams-targeting-auckland-businesses-canterbury-pensioner/GJFMXBT6BZDN3OUQBFKZIDG7OA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/robert-sands-sentenced-for-scams-targeting-auckland-businesses-canterbury-pensioner/GJFMXBT6BZDN3OUQBFKZIDG7OA/ Craig KapitanRobert Sands, who hoodwinked two businesses, claims he also was caught up in a scam. Thu, 04 Apr 2024 05:29:20 +0000 Robert Sands pleaded guilty to receiving a $3750 deposit from a 95-year-old Canterbury resident who was told on Facebook she had won a $350,000 lottery.
Opinion: Shakespeare’s not boring, but the way we learn might be https://www.nzherald.co.nz/stratford-press/news/opinion-shakespeares-not-boring-but-the-way-we-learn-might-be/U4BLYPTO5JGA3GYBK2CWHNJSEM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/stratford-press/news/opinion-shakespeares-not-boring-but-the-way-we-learn-might-be/U4BLYPTO5JGA3GYBK2CWHNJSEM/ Ilona HanneShakespeare isn't the problem, the delivery is, writes Ilona Hanne Thu, 04 Apr 2024 05:00:00 +0000 It's not Shakespeare himself who is boring, it's how we read him that's the problem, writes Ilona Hanne. Photo / Unsplash
Gun City ordered to stop claiming it is the ‘world’s largest gun store’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz https://www.nzherald.co.nz Shannon PitmanAdvertising complaint board members unanimous that ad is misleading Thu, 04 Apr 2024 05:00:00 +0000 The billboard claimed Gun City was the "World's largest gun shop".
Internal documents show Health Ministry chose to cut 134 jobs rather than trim executive salaries https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/internal-documents-show-health-ministry-chose-to-cut-134-jobs-rather-than-trim-executive-salaries/F4QZ7UQ3SNFAPNXL6NWQH3Y33U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/internal-documents-show-health-ministry-chose-to-cut-134-jobs-rather-than-trim-executive-salaries/F4QZ7UQ3SNFAPNXL6NWQH3Y33U/ Azaria HowellThe ministry is proposing job cuts to meet its savings targets.
